name: Jacob: a silent hill story
description:
warning: I am in no association with known shady company KONAMI, since the silent hill IP belongs to them. this is also a fan-game and a short story.

also, this game is for silent hill fans and for youtubers who want to do a lets play of this game. like one of my favorite youtubers, SuperHorrorBro and 8-Bit Ryan.

you are Jacob Sunderland, a detective who just recovered from his car accident in 2021. it is 2022, and Jacob has just received his new assignment. his ex-boss, Douglas Cartland, wants Jacob to investigate the old wolf estate. there seems to be suspicious activity happening in there.  what Jacob finds there will change the way he sees the world forever. 

TIP: if you get a key, do not worry about going to your inventory. just go to the door that requires a key and the item will automatically be used.
